OCA payroll engine is country-agnostic; salary rules are configured per country. OCA l10n-* repos (l10n-belgium, l10n-france, etc.) provide country specifics. IPAI adds Philippines localization.

OCA financial reports are country-agnostic; MIS Builder templates handle country specifics. Covers: l10n_be_reports, l10n_br_reports, l10n_de_reports, l10n_es_reports, l10n_fr_reports, l10n_lu_reports, l10n_mx_reports, l10n_nl_reports, l10n_uk_reports, l10n_us_payment_nacha
